Tucson sighs.

" Anger, yet understanding peace.. Discouragement, yet new h=
ope, guit yet assurance that what I'm doing, I shouldn't feel guilty for.  =
I'm feeling a balance of emotions right now.. It's rather strange actually.=
  I'm getting a feeling that as I walk down a dark tunnel, I'm beginning to=
 see a light at the end. And most of that I'm feeling right here, right now=
. Something is giving me hope and determination. I'm feeling a power of inv=
incibility, although I know not to be wreckless at the same time..  I wish =
to be conservative but there's something inside me that just wants to explo=
de.. A power, a very formidable power.  It's the power to be able to do any=
thing I put my mind to."

He then senses a Decepticon signature approaching=
 he narrows his eyes.

"Lord Elder, I may have to get back to you on that..=
.. I'm sensing a Decepticon signature headed this way...  Now who would be =
stupid enough to attempt an infiltration of the Ark all by themselves?"

Ou=
tside, Night Shift comes close to the Ark, and once again remembers to swit=
ch his symbol and signature back to his original faction.  The purple Decep=
ticon insignia switches back to the Autobot insignia, as does his energy si=
gnatures.

Back inside, Tucson now receives the reading.

"Ahh, that would =
explain it.  It's all right Lord Elder, I recognize the approaching individ=
ual.  He's an Autobot Pretender, and his name is Night Shift. His entrance =
code should still work for Ark entry."

Night Shift stops at the foot of th=
e Ark, and finds that his code still works to allow him inside.  He rolls i=
n and then transforms inside the base.

" Sorry, long time no hear..."

Tuc=
son hears his voice, and slowly walks over to Night Shift, as they greet ea=
ch other with a friendly hand shake.

" Lord Elder, this is Night Shift, ou=
r very own Autobot Pretender.  I just want you to know that he will have to=
 act like a Decepticon when he's around them, so it will appear that he's g=
oing against us when he really isn't."

Night Shift salutes Lord Elder.

" =
Good meetn' ya Sir."

Tucson now sits down as Night Shift follows him.  Nig=
ht Shift also salutes to Kup and Elita.

" Yo, Kup,Elita, long time no see.=
 Rat Trap gave me the low down about Rodimus and a few others..  Sounds lik=
e you guys are gonna need a serious pretender on your side.  Someone who ca=
n get the inside on a Decepticon point of view.  Now, when work as one of t=
hem, I gotta make it look good or else they're gonna suspect my sorry littl=
e aft of ben' a traitor. As I see it, you need a handle on that Shell progr=
am Perceptor put up.  I might and I do emphasise might, be able ta go in th=
ere, make a copy of the program'n send it back to you guys remotely.  That'=
d be the first step.  Next step would be gettn' Rodimus ta take some form o=
f bait'n try'n get 'em over here ta the Ark..  I hope Cyclonus 'n Scourge f=
all for it too...  After all they're power sharks'n whenever great power's =
concerned, they're gonna wanna be all over it."

Tucson nodds.

"You have t=
he same idea in mind that I do.  Yes, go in there, as a Decepticon, go in t=
here as their comrade, earn their trust, and perhaps throw in a lie about m=
e reaching the Matrix of Leadership.. That should really throw them off."

=
Night Shift points a playful finger at Tucson with a sly grin."

"Slag boy,=
 you are one sneaky bot.  Exactly what I had in mind but that little ditty =
at the end, didn't see that one commn'.  You got it, next stop...  Hydra's =
place right?"

Tucson nodds. Night Shift looks to everyone.

" Yo, you guys=
 okay with that right?"

g, or perhaps waiting.
